snippet.title: Golf VS Zombies | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Golf VS Zombies on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2330380/NecroGolf

We've taken the world's most drowsy sport, and threw in some zombies... to liven it up!

Golf VS Zombies is an arcade golf simulator with RPG elements which combines golfing precision with action-packed combat against the undead. Grab your clubs and get in your golf cart, for in this zombie apocalypse, there is only golf.

Swing easy and carry a big club! There is only so far your collection of clubs and balls gonna get you. Luckily, or not so, that weird guy has also survived and he has been tinkering on all sorts of things. Exploding and homing balls, sniper clubs™, drones, movement detectors and other wacky stuff. Too bad the guy accepts only bottle-caps as legal tender, but you are bound to find some - this is a wasteland afterall.

Wishlist Golf VS Zombies on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2330380/NecroGolf

Golf VS Zombies (c) Sleepwalking Potatoes 2023
Hyperstrange & Hyperstrange logo (c) Hyperstrange SA 2023
